title: A welcoming post
text:
I have two little boys, and I live in the physical plane. Thus I have lots of domestic tasks in my life, and I have wondered whether I am doing them in the smartest and easiest way I could be. So on this blog I will gather my thoughts as I learn how I can things better around the house. I feel like there is a lot of mythology around how do many household tasks—do I really need to separate colors from whites—and l want to devote a little time to figure things out now, and then not worry my head about it until the robots replace me. Also, I want to learn how to use this new, fun thing Quarto, so I’m blogging with it!
Some topics I’m going to research include the following:

Laundry
Washing dishes and am I using my dishwasher correctly!?
Improving my technique with a chef’s knife
Meal planning that works for us
How does one keep bed sheets organized
